page.title: 15VOLUNTARY ORGANISATIONS
page.content: The Deepings have a large range of voluntary organisations.We found out about each one and put them into these groups: {12 children's clubs} (Brownies,guides,scouts etc.){ } {5 playgroups}for toddlers.{8 sports {clubs} (hockey,rugby,football,netball,swimmi- ng,angling.){8 fundraising clubs} (Rotary,Innerwheel,Round Table,Lions etc.){7 women's clubs}(WI,coffee mornings etc.){5 groups that deal {with the sick or the elderly}(British Red Cross Society,OAP,Disabled,etc){ {8 religious groups}(Catholic Altar Society,Priory Church clubs etc.){3 {political groups}(Labour,Liberal etc) {3 social clubs and 1 leisure group } (drama club).Our results showed that most clubs aided the community. By Helen Joanna Andrea Michelle.
